summary: A former actress clashes with her wealthy and spoiled stepdaughter over their inheritance after the death of their protector.
cast: Lana Turner|George Chakiris|Richard Egan|Dan O'Herlihy|Karin Mossberg|Pamela Rodgers|Carlos East|Augusto Benedico|Víctor Junco|Norma Herrera|Pedro Galván|The Finks|Regina Torné|Ricardo Adalid|Javier Batiz|Carolina Cortázar|Felipe de Flores|Rogelio Guerra|José Roberto Hill|John Kelly|Roberto Meyer|Alma Muriel|Rubén Márquez|Penelope|Carlos Riquelme|Joaquín Roche|Sergio Virel
keywords: stepmother stepdaughter relationship|inheritance|drug culture|drug overdose|lifestyle of the rich
title: El terrón de azúcar
